channel.title: index on University of Iowa Math Graduate Board
channel.description: Recent content in index on University of Iowa Math Graduate Board

item.description: Statement of Purpose> Statement of Purpose The Math Graduate Board (MGB) exists to provide a forum for departmental discourse, to organize departmental events, and to generally enrich the graduate mathematics experience at the University of Iowa.

item.title: Heartland
item.description: General Information> General Information What is the Heartland Partnership?> What is the Heartland Partnership? The Heartland Partnership is a collection of schools in the Midwest that have come together in order to help each other.

item.title: Heartland Schools

item.title: Officers
item.description: Chair> Chair The Chair is responsible for planning and running the monthly MGB meetings as well as any other open meetings the Chair shall call. The Chair has the then power to convene a meeting of the Executive Board, which may be closed to members-at-large.
